com.paydiant.android.core.domain.DeviceSecurityProfile

  • Packages that use DeviceSecurityProfile 
    Package Description
    com.paydiant.android.core.facade
    Contains the core facade service implementations.
    com.paydiant.android.core.service
    Contains the services to facilitate core facade services.
    com.paydiant.android.ui.service.security
    UI services and listener implementations for the user management related operations.
